ingredients: Recipe adapted from here 1 tbsp. unsalted butter, softened 2 tablespoon Demerara sugar 3/4 cup heavy cream 1/3 cup thick yogurt 6 tablespoon sugar 2 tablespoon. kirsch 1/2 teaspoon almond extract 6 large eggs Kosher salt, to taste 3/4 cup flour 3 cups black cherries, pitted Confectioners' sugar, for dusting
